titlePage.p: Carl Nielsen / og / Thomas Laub / En Snes danske Viser [...]
WILHELM HANSEN / EDITION / KOR-BIBLIOTHEK / BLANDET KOR [...]
MELODIER / TIL / SANGBOGEN / 'DANMARK' / SAMLET OG UDGIVET TIL BRUG / FOR SKOLE OG HJEM / AF / CARL NIELSEN OG HAKON ANDERSEN [...]

notesStmt.annot: Adam OehlenschlÃ¤ger: Halvhundrede Digte, ed. F. L. Liebenberg.

This file demonstrates how different versions of the same work (for instance, with different instrumentations or text) may be described. This song has one version for voice and piano, one for piano, one for mixed choir, and one for women's choir. Sources are assigned to their specific version by indicating that they are an "embodiment of" that version ("expression") using the relations selector in the source details editor.
On the editor's "History" tab, you will notice that performances may entered either for the work in general (i.e. regardless of version) or with the individual versions.
